meanings.definition: A flat, elongated pastry resembling the tail of a beaver.
meanings.sent1: The beavertails at the fair looked delicious.
meanings.sent2: I bought a beavertail at the bakery for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled as they munched on their beavertails.
meanings.sent4: The beavertails on the plate disappeared quickly.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked beavertails filled the room.

meanings.definition: A type of fried dough pastry typically topped with sugar and cinnamon.
meanings.sent1: My favorite treat at the carnival is the sugary beavertails.
meanings.sent2: The beavertails at the food truck were warm and sweet.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't resist the temptation of the sugary beavertails.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cinnamon on the beavertails was irresistible.
meanings.sent5: The beavertails melted in my mouth with each bite.

meanings.definition: A Canadian dessert made from fried dough shaped like a beaver's tail.
meanings.sent1: During my trip to Canada, I tried the famous beavertails.
meanings.sent2: The beavertails in the shape of a tail were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent3: Everyone at the gathering enjoyed the unique beavertails.
meanings.sent4: The beavertails were a sweet reminder of my Canadian adventure.
meanings.sent5: The beavertails were a tasty tribute to Canadian cuisine.

meanings.definition: A popular treat at winter festivals and events.
meanings.sent1: The beavertails were a hit at the winter carnival.
meanings.sent2: I always look forward to enjoying beavertails at the festival.
meanings.sent3: The beavertails warmed us up on the chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: The line for the beavertails was the longest at the event.
meanings.sent5: The beavertails added a festive touch to the winter celebration.
